hero.title: Hello, I'm Eduardo de Paula.
hero.description: Full-stack software developer passionate about creating solutions.

description.first: I work as a full-stack developer, specializing in React and TypeScript. My portfolio also includes the creation of chatbot solutions, as well as robust back-end development with Node.js.
description.second: I also stand out for my ability to implement and optimize cloud infrastructures, using AWS and OCI solutions to achieve operational excellence and system scalability.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I've worked on.
